common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Use this api to get the parameter "info_needed" from the response to check if the order has pickup or dropoff or no integrate options. This api will also return the addresses and pickup time id options for the pickup method. For dropoff, it can return branch id, sender real name etc, depending on the 3PL requirements.

error_list.name: logistics.error_param
error_list.description: The order is being allocated, please wait until the allocate is completed.

error_list.name: logistics.error_channel_exist
error_list.description: Fail to find the fulfillment channel of this order.

error_list.name: error_permission
error_list.description: Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: {msg}.

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: System error. Please try again later.

error_list.name: common.invalid_shop
error_list.description: Shop id is invalid. Please check your shop.

error_list.name: logistics.package_number_not_exist
error_list.description: Please request with package_number for this split order.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"name":"order_sn","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"201214JASXYXY6","type":"string","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for an order.","key":"WscWSkp"},{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You should't fill the field with empty string when there is't a package number.

","name":"package_number","sample":"OFG134731496217591","type":"string","required":"False","key":"FJHaZHb"}],"response_params":[{"sample":"2880a5a28510424eaa3288fd941fae2c","type":"string","name":"request_id","description":"The identifier for an API request for error tracking.","key":"RafMwbp"},{"sample":"error_auth","type":"string","name":"error","description":"Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.","key":"SxTfeXT"},{"sample":"Invalid access_token.","type":"string","name":"message","description":"Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.","key":"EMJkyCD"},{"sample":"","type":"object","description":"Detail informations you are querying.","name":"response","children":[{"sample":"","type":"object","description":"The parameters required based on each specific order to Init. Must use the fields included under info_needed to call Init. For logistic_id 80003 and 80004, both Regular and JOB shipping methods are supported. If you choose Regular shipping method, please use \"tracking_no\" to call Init API. If you choose JOB shipping method, please use \"sender_real_name\" to call Init API. Note that only one of \"tracking_no\" and \"sender_real_name\" can be selected.","name":"info_needed","children":[{"sample":"[ ]","type":"string[]","name":"dropoff","description":"Could contain 'branch_id', 'sender_real_name' or 'tracking_no'. If it contains 'branch_id', choose one to Init. If it contains 'sender_real_name' or 'tracking_no', should manually input these values in Init API. If it has empty value, developer should still include \"dropoff\" field in Init API.Could contain 'slug'.If it contains 'slug', to return selected 3PL partner only for TW C2C sellers to drop-off parcels with.","key":"GPZHtzp"},{"sample":"[\"address_id\", \"pickup_time_id\"]","type":"string[]","name":"pickup","description":"

Could contain 'address_id' and 'pickup_time_id'. Choose one address_id and its corresponding pickup_time_id to Init. If it has empty value, developer should still include \"pickup\" field in Init API.It could contains \"tracking_number\" returned from \"info_need\"for some channels, please also add it when init.

","key":"ciyRaWd"},{"sample":"","type":"string[]","name":"non_integrated","description":"Could contain 'tracking_no'. If it contains 'tracking_no', should manually input these values in Init API. If it has empty value, developer should still include \"non-integrated\" field in Init API.","key":"CPjtWQZ"}],"key":"hbxRBZd"},{"sample":"","type":"object","description":"Logistics information for ","key":"ADzznjj"},{"sample":"","type":"object[]","description":"

List of pickup_time information corresponding to the address_id.


Some logistics channels may not return any date or time for pickup time slots. In such cases, sellers can arrange shipment without selecting any time slot, and Shopee will arrange a suitable timing for these situations.

","name":"time_slot_list","children":[{"sample":"1608103685","type":"timestamp","name":"date","description":"The date of pickup time. In timestamp.","key":"bCwyxQY"},{"sample":"","type":"string","name":"time_text","description":"The text description of pickup time. Only applicable for certain channels.","key":"MQMMiNR"},{"sample":"","type":"string","name":"pickup_time_id","description":"The identity of pickuptime.","key":"zywsDKf"},{"description":"

This field will have the value “recommended” for the time slot that Shopee suggests sellers choose. 


While it is advisable for sellers to choose the recommended time slot, they can also choose other time slots that do not have the recommended flag.

","name":"flags","sample":"[\"recommended\"]","type":"string[]","required":null,"key":"rDXEDfF"}],"key":"rNMnDFp"}],"key":"HbTwbWd"}],"key":"FntFrZy"}],"key":"FTywXyE"}]}
